remarks.format: ## Remarks Name 屬性可以視為的使用者可以用來說明所參考的控制項的文字字串。The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to. 請務必中所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情況下，項目可以在螢幕上，但仍無法顯示，例如，如果項目會隱藏其他項目。In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements. 方法會傳回在此情況下`false`。In this case the method would return `false`.
